meanings.sent1: The bacteriolytic soap killed all the harmful germs on my hands.
meanings.sent2: The bacteriolytic medication helped fight off the infection.
meanings.sent3: The superhero's bacteriolytic powers saved the city from a bacterial invasion.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like a bacteriolytic ray of sunshine, brightening everyone's day.
meanings.sent5: The bacteriolytic spray was so effective that it wiped out all traces of bacteria.

meanings.definition: Capable of breaking down bacterial cells.
meanings.sent1: The bacteriolytic enzyme was able to break down the tough bacterial cell walls.
meanings.sent2: Scientists are studying bacteriolytic substances for their potential in fighting antibiotic-resistant bacteria.
meanings.sent3: The tiny bacteriolytic robots worked together to dismantle the bacterial cells in the lab.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was like a bacteriolytic force, breaking down all obstacles in her path.
meanings.sent5: The bacteriolytic solution was so powerful that it dissolved the bacterial cells instantly.
